mapper.insert:
SELECT FREEBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO FREEBOARD (IDX, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENT, REGDATE, HIT) VALUES (#{idx}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT FREEBOARD.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY IDX DESC) RNUM FROM FREEBOARD WHERE 1=1
) FREEBOD WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREEBOARD_FILES( FILE_NO, IDX, ORG_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE )VALUES( SEQ_FREEBOARD_FILES_NO.NEXTVAL, #{IDX}, #{ORG_FILE_NAME}, #{STORED_FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_SIZE} )
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NO, ORG_FILE_NAME, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024, 1) AS FILE_SIZE FROM FREEBOARD_FILES WHERE IDX = #{idx} AND DEL_GB = 'N'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT FREEBOARD.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY IDX DESC) RNUM FROM FREEBOARD WHERE 1=1 ) FREEBOD WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 11 AND 20
